title: Manage Lost and Found
description: A bus driver turns in a wallet found on their bus. An agent must log the item and attempt to contact the owner.

tasks.description: Log the found item into the lost and found system, noting the date, time, route, and a description of the item.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new lost and found record is created.
Agent finds a driver's license inside.

tasks.description: Search the fare card database for a passenger with a matching name to find contact information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a matching registered passenger and their phone number.

tasks.description: Contact the passenger to inform them their wallet has been found and explain the pickup procedure.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent successfully contacts the owner.
